languages.text: "Я уже последние стельки сварил на жидкий бульон... и тут все закончилось. Снова пайки выдавать начали, даже лучше прежнего".

traits.locale_text: "Я уже последние стельки сварил на жидкий бульон... и тут все закончилось. Снова пайки выдавать начали, даже лучше прежнего".

languages.text: "I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."
languages.original_text: "Я уже последние стельки сварил на жидкий бульон... и тут все закончилось. Снова пайки выдавать начали, даже лучше прежнего".

traits.locale_text: "I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."
"I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."
"I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."
"I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."
"I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."

languages.text: 「最後のヒラメからスープを作ったばかりだった…そして、何事もなかったかのようにあっという間に終わった。再び食糧を配り始めたんだ。以前よりもさらに良いものをね」
languages.original_text: "I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."

traits.locale_text: 「最後のヒラメからスープを作ったばかりだった…そして、何事もなかったかのようにあっという間に終わった。再び食糧を配り始めたんだ。以前よりもさらに良いものをね」

languages.text: « J'étais en train de préparer une soupe avec mes dernières semelles... Et là, pouf ! Tout était terminé. Ils ont recommencé à distribuer des rations, et elles ont meilleur goût qu'avant. »
languages.original_text: "I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."

traits.locale_text: « J'étais en train de préparer une soupe avec mes dernières semelles... Et là, pouf ! Tout était terminé. Ils ont recommencé à distribuer des rations, et elles ont meilleur goût qu'avant. »

languages.text: “我刚刚把用最后那块鞋底熬了锅汤……然后这场饥荒就结束了。他们又开始分发口粮了，而且比以前分的东西更好吃。”
languages.original_text: "I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."

traits.locale_text: “我刚刚把用最后那块鞋底熬了锅汤……然后这场饥荒就结束了。他们又开始分发口粮了，而且比以前分的东西更好吃。”

languages.text: «Acababa de hacer una sopa con lo poquito que me quedaba... y, tal que así, a pasar hambre. Pero ahora han vuelto a repartir raciones y están mejor que antes».
languages.original_text: "I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."

traits.locale_text: «Acababa de hacer una sopa con lo poquito que me quedaba... y, tal que así, a pasar hambre. Pero ahora han vuelto a repartir raciones y están mejor que antes».

languages.text: "Ich hatte gerade Suppe aus meinen letzten Sohlen gemacht ... und dann war es vorbei, einfach so. Sie haben angefangen, wieder Rationen zu verteilen, und die sind sogar besser als früher."
languages.original_text: "I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte gerade Suppe aus meinen letzten Sohlen gemacht ... und dann war es vorbei, einfach so. Sie haben angefangen, wieder Rationen zu verteilen, und die sind sogar besser als früher."

languages.text: "Kalan dil balıklarından çorba yapmıştım... Derken bir anda her şey değişti. Yine kumanya dağıtmaya başladılar, üstelik kumanyalar daha iyi."
languages.original_text: "I'd just made soup out of my last soles... and then, just like that, it was over. They started handing out rations again, and they're even better than before."

traits.locale_text: "Kalan dil balıklarından çorba yapmıştım... Derken bir anda her şey değişti. Yine kumanya dağıtmaya başladılar, üstelik kumanyalar daha iyi."
